autoscaling:ImageId.description: Filters access based on the AMI ID for the launch configuration

autoscaling:InstanceType.description: Filters access based on the instance type for the launch configuration

autoscaling:InstanceTypes.description: Filters access based on the instance types present as overrides to a launch template for a mixed instances policy. Use it to qualify which instance types can be explicitly defined in the policy

autoscaling:LaunchConfigurationName.description: Filters access based on the name of a launch configuration

autoscaling:LaunchTemplateVersionSpecifi.description: Filters access based on whether users can specify any version of a launch template or only the Latest or Default version

autoscaling:LoadBalancerNames.description: Filters access based on the name of the load balancer

autoscaling:MaxSize.description: Filters access based on the maximum scaling size in the request

autoscaling:MetadataHttpEndpoint.description: Filters access based on whether the HTTP endpoint is enabled for the instance metadata service

autoscaling:MetadataHttpPutResponseHopLi.description: Filters access based on the allowed number of hops when calling the instance metadata service

autoscaling:MetadataHttpTokens.description: Filters access based on whether tokens are required when calling the instance metadata service (optional or required)

autoscaling:MinSize.description: Filters access based on the minimum scaling size in the request

autoscaling:ResourceTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access based on the tags associated with the resource

autoscaling:SpotPrice.description: Filters access based on the price for Spot Instances for the launch configuration

autoscaling:TargetGroupARNs.description: Filters access based on the ARN of a target group

autoscaling:VPCZoneIdentifiers.description: Filters access based on the identifier of a VPC zone

aws:RequestTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access based on the tags that are passed in the request

aws:ResourceTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access based on the tags associated with the resource

aws:TagKeys.description: Filters access based on the tag keys that are passed in the request
